dialogue: How do you drink so much coffee and stay so calm?
It's easy. I wear a "Thundershirt" under my work clothes.
It was designed to make dogs feel safe during thunderstorms.
When I saw the commercial for it on TV, I wondered what else it could do, so I bought one.
I haven't had a bad day at work since then.
Did you convince a co-worker to wear pet clothes?
That's how I reduce my stress.
